title: Fight or flight: Serotonin neurons prompt brain to make the right call

title_detail.value: Fight or flight: Serotonin neurons prompt brain to make the right call

summary: Known for its role in relieving depression, the neurochemical serotonin may also help the brain execute instantaneous, appropriate behaviors in emergency situations, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Known for its role in relieving depression, the neurochemical serotonin may also help the brain execute instantaneous, appropriate behaviors in emergency situations, according to a new study.
